Thanks for noticing my comment. I have it myself discovered. If I-Doser opens and files are in the Dose Files-folder for the program, then the size of the files do a little bit change.

There are so many files, you don't know were to begin.  Therfore you must go to the homepage of I-Doser to get a better understandig of the grouping.
